title: Biggest game in the world yet the forums are dead

replies.body:
I truly miss the threads complaining about gender and relationship issues on GD.

"I am a trangender demisexual indepedant chair stuck inside a fox's spirit stuck inside a human body and I feel offended because Ahri is so oversexualized and I solely believe Riot's champion designers are sexist men!"
Dude put some effort into that comment lol.

OCE GD used to be dead between 10 or 11 - 12, then from 1 - 3 there would generally be an influx of posts before officially died at around 4 or 5.

Resurrected at about 7 or 8 by some early bird posting sprees, then dead again until 10 or 11, when the forum really came back to life and daily routine resumed.
It's for OCE, and it's currently 3am, so you know.
Pffff on GD people would still be up now makin threads, used to enjoy reading funny threads when i couldnt sleep but i guess now that'll never happen again.

I don't know about the others who make 2-5am threads, but lately I've been busy, or not had anything to post about.

We are all still lurking I'm sure of it.
.. When i posted on forums there was only like 1 threads every hour after midnight js
